陈炳阳，1993年生，博士，河南工业大学青年教师。主要从事物理约束的深度学习建模，动力电池健康管理等研究工作。
主持国家自然科学基金，河南省科技攻关，校级开放课题、高层次人才项目、创新基金等多项等多项横纵向项目。发表知名期刊及会议论文20余篇，其中第一/通信作者中科院一区10篇、二区2篇。申请发明专利4项，其中授权1项。国家公派赴加拿大多伦多大学 (全球TOP20) 计算机专业访学。获博士研究生国家奖学金、中国技术市场协会金桥奖等多项奖励。
指导多名学生参赛获得全国一等奖，获得国家奖学金，国家励志奖学金，并成功保研到电子科大，东南大学等985高校。



Bingyang Chen, Ph.D., born 1993, is a young faculty member at Henan University of Technology.
His research focuses on physics-constrained deep learning modeling and battery health management. He has led multiple national and provincial research projects, including the National Natural Science Foundation of China, Henan Science and Technology Key Projects, university-level open projects, high-level talent projects, and innovation funds.
He has published over 20 papers in reputable journals and conferences, including 10 papers as first/corresponding author in top-tier journals (Q1, Chinese Academy of Sciences) and 2 papers in Q2 journals. He has filed 4 invention patents, with 1 already granted. He conducted a government-sponsored visiting study in the Computer Science Department at the University of Toronto, Canada. His awards include the National Scholarship for Ph.D. students and the Golden Bridge Award from the China Technology Market Association, among others.
He has mentored multiple students who won first prizes in national competitions, received National Scholarships and National Encouragement Scholarships, and successfully secured graduate admissions to top Chinese universities such as the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China and Southeast University.

2022.04-2023.04，加拿大多伦多大学（全球TOP20）计算机与电子信息工程学院，博士联培
2020.09-2024.06，中国石油大学计算机学院，博士研究生



2024.07–Present, Lecturer, School of Information Science and Engineering, Henan University of Technology
2022.04–2023.04, Joint Ph.D. in Department of Computer and Electrical Engineering, University of Toronto (Global Top 20)
2020.09–2024.06, Ph.D. in Computer Science, China University of Petroleum





基于领域知识的数据表征方法：结合领域知识，针对时序传感数据，图像数据，建立多模态表征方法。
面向样本约束的适应性建模：基于独立协同/边缘计算，或基于数据对齐策略构建领域大语言模型，提高模型在目标少样本任务的有效性。





Domain knowledge-based data representation: Develop multimodal representation methods for time-series sensor data and image data by integrating domain knowledge.
Sample-constrained adaptive modeling: Build domain-specific large language models through collaborative/edge computing or data alignment strategies to improve performance in few-shot tasks.

Congratulations to Xinming Hu, Yuyang Jiang, and Can Jiang for winning the National Scholarship.
Congratulations to Xinming Hu and Yuyang Jiang for being recommended to the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China for graduate study.
Congratulations to Can Jiang for being recommended to Southeast University for graduate study.
Sept. 2025: Our paper “PIFL: Physics-informed federated learning for progressive degradation estimation in energy storage devices” was accepted by the AEI (Top Q1 journal).
Jul. 2025: Our paper “A Domain Knowledge-Guided Industrial Large Model Framework: A Case Study in Battery Health Estimation and Recycling” was accepted by TII (Top Q1 journal).
Congratulations to Can Jiang for winning the National First Prize in the Information Security and Confrontation Technology Competition.
Congratulations to Xinming Hu for winning the National Second Prize in the Data Statistics and Analysis Competition.





目前主要招收本科生，比较缺人手，不需要英语成绩，希望具有一定的Python编程基础，欢迎有保研需求（需具备科研经历）的同学联系我。请将简历发送至邮箱(bingyangchen@haut.edu.cn)，简历中请包含：

Python 成绩或相关项目
科研经历
每周可投入的时间

2个工作日内必回复。期待一波优秀的小伙伴加入，嚣张奋斗，凶猛成长。
不PUA，不PUSH， 不签到，不打卡，没有杂活，一起做科研，不多哔哔，事儿上见吧。



Currently, I am supervising undergraduate students only and have limited capacity. No English proficiency test is required, but students are expected to have a basic Python programming background.
Students who are interested in pursuing postgraduate studies (requiring research experience) are welcome to contact me. Please send your CV to my email， including:

Python skills and relevant projects
Research experience
Weekly time commitment

I guarantee a reply within 24 hours on working days. I look forward to talented and motivated students joining the team to work hard, grow fast, and achieve great things together.
No PUA, no pressure, no mandatory check-ins, no clocking in, and no trivial tasks. We focus on research only—less talk, more action. Let’s prove ourselves through real work.
